content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Boiler at position(-24.5, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler (position -24.5, -50.0) connected to pipes (positions -24.5, -51.5; -23.5, -51.5; -22.5, -51.5; -22.5, -50.5; -22.5, -49.5; -22.5, -48.5)

### Steam Engine at position(-29.5, 30.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine (position -29.5, 30.5) which is currently not connected to a power network

### Offshore Pump at position(-10.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump (position -10.5, 25.5) connected to pipes (positions -11.5, 23.5; -10.5, 24.5; -11.5, 24.5)

### Pipe Groups
- Pipe Group (fluid system 52873, position -24.5, -51.5) with pipes connecting various entities
- Pipe Group (fluid system 52912, position -4.5, 21.5) with pipes connecting various entities
- Pipe Group (fluid system 52913, position -4.5, 23.5) with pipes connecting various entities

### Labs
- Lab (position not specified, status: NO_POWER)

### Electricity Group
- Electricity Group (id 244499) with small electric poles at various positions including (-22.5, 20.5), (-20.5, 20.5), (-19.5, 20.5), and (-27.5, 29.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting boiler to steam engine
- Ensure that pipes are correctly placed and connected. Check the positions of the boiler and steam engine to ensure they are within the connection range of the pipes.

### Errors when lab has no power
- Make sure that the lab is connected to a power network. Verify that there are sufficient power sources connected to the electricity grid.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
